comments:
Environment:

eclipse.buildId=N20060224-0010
java.version=1.5.0_06
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_CA
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86

Steps to reproduce:

1) Create a new workspace.
2) Right-click in the Package Explorer > New > Project.
3) Cancel the New Project wizard.
4) Right-click in the Package Explorer > New > Package. (This also happens with the New Class wizard as well)
5) Eclipse locks up at this point and the following error is in the .log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-02-24 09:29:44.607

If I do not perform step #2 (i.e. invoke the New Project wizard) then this problem does not happen and the New Package dialog opens successfully.
N20060224-0010 seems to be completely broken.  It's possible that this bug is being caused by an earlier one.  Tod, are you able to run this build?

Please reopen if you see it again.  This looks like a dup of bug 129607.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 129607 ***
